title: Adam Sandler encourages his daughters' interests in show business and says he'll 'back them up'
text:
Many stars such as Mila Kunis have shared their hope for their children to not follow their steps in show business.

However, Adam Sandler has revealed he'd be more than on-board if his daughters -who are already showing signs of being musicians - entered the entertainment field.

The 53-year-old revealed on Thursday that Sadie, 13, and Sunny, 10, have no fear of stage fright and frequently take to the stage and showcase their talents.

He's got their back: Adam Sandler said he was happy to encourage his daughter's interests in show-business after they both showed interest and talent in singing (pictured 2019)

'Both my daughters come on stage and sing sometimes because they're on the road with me all the time,' he told Us Weekly.

'They like to sing … and they see Daddy up there and they're like, "Can I try that?" So I say, "Get on up there".'

Adam continued to express that whether it's singing or not, he's got their back

Supportive dad: 'Whatever they’re excited about in their lives, I’ll back them up' (pictured 2016)

'Whatever they’re excited about in their lives, I’ll back them up.'

Sunny recently took to the stage with her dad during his comedy show in New Jersey to belt out A Million Dreams from The Greatest Showman.

As for Adam, he's been working with the Safdies brothers, Josh and Benny for his role in Uncut Gems.

Playing a jewellery store owner and dealer whose life gets turned upside down following a robbery, he said his experience made him feel 'very free.'

New role: Playing a jewellery store owner and dealer whose life gets turned upside down following a robbery, he said his experience made him feel 'very free'

'It felt good. It's very free, in a way. You don't know where the cameras are, and sometimes you don't know what you're shooting,' he told The Hollywood Reporter.

'Sometimes I didn't know whether it was a close-up or far away, if I was blocking my face or where to look. The cameras were in positions that I hadn't seen before, so I didn't know what was happening.'

He continued: 'It was very New York in that way.'

Uncut Gems is scheduled for release on December 13, 2019.

Adam has been married to model-actress, Jacqueline Titone, since 2003. She converted to Judaism to be with him.

The couple welcomed Sadie in May 2006 and Sunny in November 2008.
description: Adam Sandler said he was happy to encourage his daughters' interests in show-business after they both showed interest and talent in singing.
